population_below_poverty.title: Poverty headcount
population_below_poverty.legend_text: The poverty headcount is the share of the population whose consumption / expenditure is below the poverty line by Aimag. Year: 2018. Source: National Statistics Office

disabled.title: Number of disabled people
disabled.legend_text: Number of people whose ability was impaired for more than 12 months by Aimag. Year: 2018. Source: National Statistical Office

elderly.title: Single-headed elderly households
elderly.legend_text: Number of single-headed households with a female head over 55 years old or a male head over 60 years old by Aimag. Year: 2018. Source: National Statistics Office

herders.title: Herder households
herders.legend_text: Number of herder households - defined as herding as the main source of income by Soum. Year: 2019. Source: National Statistical Office

livestock.title: Number of livestock (in thousands)
livestock.legend_text: Number of livestock raised for agricultural purposes in thousands of heads by Soum. Year: 2019. Source: National Statistical Office

child.title: Number of children under 5
child.legend_text: Number of children under five years of age by Soum. Year: 2019. Source: National Statistics Office

herd_200.title: Small herder households
herd_200.legend_text: Number of households with less than 200 heads of livestock by Aimag. Year: 2019. Source: National Statistics Office

population_total.title: Total population
population_total.legend_text: Total number of residents by Aimag. Year: 2019. Source: National Statistics Office

pasture_anomaly.title: Pasture anomaly
pasture_anomaly.legend_text: Compares the current pasture conditions to the long term average to calculate pasture anomaly

ndvi.title: Vegetation index (NDVI)
ndvi.legend_text: Median averaged Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) from composite satellite imagery

ModisLST.title: Surface temperature
ModisLST.legend_text: Median value of Land Surface Temperature in degrees Celsius over a 10-day period (MODIS)

ModisVHI.title: Agricultural drought (VHI)
ModisVHI.legend_text: Vegetation Health Index for a 10-day period. The VHI is a combination of vegetation conditions and temperature conditions.

ModisSnowPercentage.title: Snow cover (%)
ModisSnowPercentage.legend_text: Snow Percentage for a 10-day period, where the value represent the percentage of times that a pixel had snow

DzudRiskMap.title: Dzud risk
DzudRiskMap.legend_text: The dzud risk map is produced by the Mongolia Information and Research Institute of Meteorology, Hydrology and Environment (IRIMHE) and measures dzud risk based on a combination of climate hazards, pasture conditions and capacity, and risk exposure to livestock. Latest version: December 2019

herd_pasture_impact.title: Herders exposed to severe pasture anomaly
herd_pasture_impact.legend_text: Number of herder households within a soum where the median pasture anomaly is <= -50%

small_herder_dzud_risk.title: Small herders exposed to very high dzud risk
small_herder_dzud_risk.legend_text: Number of small herder households within an aimag with very high risk of dzud

livestock_dzud_risk.title: Livestock exposed to very high dzud risk
livestock_dzud_risk.legend_text: Number of livestock within a soum with very high risk of dzud

livestock_vhi.title: Livestock exposed to drought (VHI)
livestock_vhi.legend_text: Number of livestock within a soum with drought conditions as measured through the Vegetation Health Index

snow_groundstations.title: Temperature
snow_groundstations.legend_text: Temperature from ground station data reported in degrees celsius
